title: Hyper Casual Game UI
description: Welcome to “Hyper Casual Game UI,” Epic Stock Media’s newest UI/UX sound effects library!
longDescription:
Audio demo


Welcome to “Hyper Casual Game UI,” Epic Stock Media’s newest UI/UX sound effects library! This meticulously crafted collection is designed to enhance your everyday tech, apps, and video games with a delightful array of blings, trills, buttons, positive & negative notifications, sparkly tones and more. Whether you're developing casual mobile games, puzzle adventures, or platformers, Hyper Casual Game UI offers a simple yet sophisticated sound design palette perfectly suited for your projects.


406 sound files 

  • 275.3 MB of game audio assets
  • All files in 44k 16bit .wav format
  • Includes 26 minutes of audio
  • Achievements, General Buttons, Negative, Notifications, Positive, and Selects sound categories


Versatile and Game-Ready.


These sound effects are optimized for seamless integration into your game, TV, or film projects. Each sound effect is expertly edited and mastered, ensuring it's ready to be used out of the box (RTU-OTB). The memory footprint optimization makes them efficient for any platform or genre, saving you valuable development time.


Includes UI/UX sounds like - friendly achievements, positive and negative alerts, affirmations, soft select, denied, melodic, calm, ding, pop up, message, window, new task, new quest, chimes, confirms, items, beep, tap, pop, cute, next page movement, bright bells, sweeps, airy whoosh, general buttons, simple ui, tonal, musical, and many more.


Organized and Easily Accessible.


The library follows the Universal Category System (UCS) labeling for smooth navigation. The files are organized into categories like Achievements, General Buttons, Negative, Notifications, Positive, and Selects. Additionally, Soundminer metadata is embedded to help you quickly find the right sound at the right time.


Royalty-Free Licensing.


Rest assured that all sound effects are royalty-free, meaning you can use them in your projects without worrying about additional fees. The license allows for commercial use, making it perfect for both indie developers and professional sound designers.


Product details:

  • 406 sounds 
  • 275.3 MB of game audio assets
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav
  • All files are game ready, mastered and memory footprint optimized
  • Perfect for game devs & sound designers
  • Includes 26 minutes of audio
  • 17 Achievements
  • 49 General Button
  • 125 Negative
  • 65 Notification
  • 42 Positive
  • 108 Select
  • Includes embedded Soundminer metadata
  • UCS Compliant
  • All sound effects & music loops are youtube friendly & royalty-free
  • RTU-OTB (Ready to be used out of the box)
